name: Cellie the Cell and the Spooky Fish
name_original: Cellie the Cell and the Spooky Fish
description:
In this cell-centric game,  you play as a modern-day animal cell that finds itself transported to a medieval kingdom and massively enlarged. However, this violation unto the natural order of things has upset Mr. Bubbles, a cruel bounty hunter sent to devour Cellie before it can alter the course of history.

Your goal is to last as long as you can, gobbling up enough objects to gain access to the important drains which will bring you to another area. Mr. Bubbles gets faster, and more items are required to progress as the game advances, so look out!

Whether you're chasing down princes and princesses in a castle, or picking up sticks in a forest, I hope you enjoy your time as a cell in this fantasy setting.

Controls:

Arrow keys/ w,a,s,d - Move Cellie/Navigate menu

Z - Use drain

Space/Return - Select menu option
